title: Beneath the City's Roots
goal: Discover the true, hidden source of the blight within the city, revealing Valerius's deeper, more sinister plan.
stakes_shift: The blight's nexus is found beneath the city, indicating a deeper, more sinister plan than mere corruption, and revealing Valerius's ultimate goal.

bridge.from_prev: The group is hiding in the city's underbelly after escaping Valerius's forces.
bridge.to_next: The group interrupts Valerius's ritual, preventing a major blight escalation and leading to the final confrontation.

sections.title: The Root of Decay
sections.intent: The group explores the tunnels, discovering signs of deeper corruption.

scenes.summary: As they navigate the ancient tunnels, the air grows heavy, and strange, blighted growths cling to the walls, leading them deeper.
scenes.outcome: The group discovers the tunnels are permeated with the Shadow Blight, leading them to its source.

sections.title: Valerius's Sanctum
sections.intent: Discover Valerius's hidden ritual chamber, the true heart of his operations.

scenes.summary: They discover a vast, hidden chamber pulsing with dark energy, where Valerius conducts a grotesque ritual to amplify the blight.
scenes.outcome: The group discovers Valerius's secret sanctum, the true source of the blight within the city.

sections.title: The Blighted Heart
sections.intent: The group realizes the full scope of Valerius's plan and the immediate danger.

scenes.summary: The ritual is nearing completion, threatening to unleash a catastrophic wave of blight across the entire region, revealing Valerius's ultimate goal.
scenes.outcome: The group realizes Valerius's ritual is on the verge of unleashing a devastating blight upon the city and surrounding lands.
